Replace.Text: Artifact Extracted
An artifact has been uncovered, giving us insight into the past.
As the dirt is brushed away, the {GreatWorkName} sees the light of sun after ages. It will grace the museums of {ActingPlayerCivName} for years to come.
Barbarian Camp Destroyed
A hostile barbarian camp was leveled to the ground by a unit, spreading peace through the area.
Our forces clear a barbarian camp, and a threat to our growing civilization is vanquished.
Threatening Camp Destroyed
A hostile barbarian camp within 6 tiles of one of your cities was destroyed by a unit.
The danger on the doorstep of {CityName} has been defeated! The barbarians are driven away.
Battle Fought
A battle was fought between adversaries. Used by the Archaeology system to potentially generate [ICON_RESOURCE_ANTIQUITY_SITE] Antiquity Site resources.
Religion Adopts All Beliefs
Your Religion has added its final Belief and is now complete.
Theologians clarify the tenets of {ReligionName} and its Beliefs.
World's First Religion to Adopt All Beliefs
Your Religion is the first in the world to add its final Belief and become complete.
The arguments of the theologians of {ReligionName} fill great books, and it becomes the first Religion to clarify its Beliefs.
Unique Building Constructed
You have completed this unique building for the first time.
Our people take pride in the {BuildingType}, which reflects our values and priorities.
World Wonder Completed
A world wonder is completed, showing our grandeur over other civilizations.
Standing in the {BuildingType}, the citizens of {CityName} are filled with awe.
Old World Wonder Completed
A World Wonder is completed. Even though it belongs to a bygone era, it will still show our grandeur over other civilizations.
Standing in the {BuildingType}, the citizens of {CityName} remember their glorious past.
World's Largest Civilization
Your civilization has become the largest in the world, with at least 3 more cities than its next biggest rival.
{CityName} is the latest city in our sprawling empire, and other civilizations look on in awe.
City of Awe
A city is placed within 2 tiles of a natural wonder.
The inspirational sight of {FeatureType} fills the citizens of our new city of {CityName} with joy.
Aggressive City Placement
A city is placed within 5 tiles of another civilization's city.
The bureaucrats of {TargetPlayerCivName} are piqued by our boldness in settling {CityName} so near their own city of {OtherCityName}.
City on New Continent
A city is placed on a continent you have not yet settled.
{CityName} becomes the first settlement on {ContinentName}!
Desert City
A city is established on difficult Desert terrain, expanding your reach into the wilds.
Visitors complain about the heat of {CityName}, but at least it's a dry heat.
Snow City
A city is established on difficult Snow terrain, expanding your reach into the wilds.
The citizens of {CityName} have a hundred words for "snow."
Tundra City
A city is established on difficult Tundra terrain, expanding your reach into the wilds.
The citizens of {CityName} take pride in the land's rugged beauty and their own hardiness.
Enemy City Adopts Our Religion
An enemy city, despite being at war, has seen the light and adopted our Religion.
Heaven opens the eyes of the people of {CityName}, and they join the faithful followers of {ReligionName}, even while at war with {ActingPlayerCivName}.
Rival Holy City Converted
The Holy City of another Religion has converted to our Religion.
{CityName} was once the cradle of {OldReligionName}, but now the faithful flock to the temples of {ReligionName}.
First Gigantic City
A city has reached 20 [ICON_Citizen] Population for the first time in your civilization.
Paradoxically, the citizens of {CityName} are both incredibly proud of their city's size, and yet never stop complaining about how crowded it has gotten.
World's First Gigantic City
A city has reached 20 [ICON_Citizen] Population for the first time in the world.
They say you haven't lived until you've seen the crowds in {CityName} walking its boulevards and avenues, and taken in the spectacle of humanity's largest city.
First Enormous City
A city has reached 15 [ICON_Citizen] Population for the first time in your civilization.
{CityName} expands further, and becomes the largest city of our people.
World's First Enormous City
A city has reached 15 [ICON_Citizen] Population for the first time in the world.
The residents of {CityName} brag of living in the world's largest, most sophisticated city.
First Large City
A city has reached 10 [ICON_Citizen] Population for the first time in your civilization.
{CityName} grows and its people take pride in the thriving metropolitan life.
World's First Large City
A city has reached 10 [ICON_Citizen] Population for the first time in the world.
Visitors speak in awe of {CityName}, the largest city in the world. How do so many people live together in peace?
Foreign City Joins
A foreign city has decided to pledge its loyalty to us instead, joining our empire.
The people of {CityName} no longer feel part of {TargetPlayerCivName}, and agree to join our civilization.
Free City Joins
A Free City has decided to pledge its loyalty to us, joining our empire.
The citizens of {CityName} feel an affinity with us, and willingly enter our civilization.
Foreign Capital Taken
You have taken control of a foreign power's original capital city.
{CityName}, the former capital of {TargetPlayerCivName}, is now part of our civilization!
Final Foreign City Taken
You have taken control of a civilization's last remaining city.
{TargetPlayerCivName} will not stand the test of time.
City Returns to Original Owner
A city has returned to its original owner.
{CityName} returns to {ActingPlayerCivName} once more!
First Civic of New Era
You have completed your civilization's first civic from a new era of discovery.
Let others say what they will, but the real flourishing of {PlayerEraType} culture began with the rise of {CivicType} in {ActingPlayerCivName}.
World's First Civic of New Era
You have completed the world's first civic from a new era of discovery.
Our expression of {CivicType} will define humanity's future in the {PlayerEraType}!
Unique District Completed
You have completed this unique district for the first time.
The {DistrictType} was no accident, but the result of the unique genius of our people.
Splendid Campus Completed
You have completed your civilization's first Campus with a starting adjacency bonus of 3 [ICON_Science] Science or higher.
Walking the quads and lingering outside classrooms of the Campus near {CityName}, you can hear scholars debate the ideas that will change the world.
Splendid Commercial Hub Completed
You have completed your civilization's first Commercial Hub with a starting adjacency bonus of 4 [ICON_Gold] Gold or higher.
They say that people are drawn to the Commercial Hub of {CityName} just for the excitement of buying and selling in the market. But the money is pretty good, too.
Splendid Harbor Completed
You have completed your civilization's first Harbor with a starting adjacency bonus of 4 [ICON_Gold] Gold or higher.
Sailors and stevedores shout and sing shanties all along the bustling wharfs in the Harbor of {CityName}.
Splendid Holy Site Completed
You have completed your civilization's first Holy Site with a starting adjacency bonus of 3 [ICON_Faith] Faith or higher.
Chimes and chanting, incense and icon, the Holy Site of {CityName} brings worshippers and pilgrims into contemplation of the higher matters.
Splendid Industrial Zone Completed
You have completed your civilization's first Industrial Zone with a starting adjacency bonus of 4 [ICON_Production] Production or higher.
Whistles indicate the start of a new shift, and workers from {CityName} stream into the Industrial Zone, ready to put in a good day's work.
Splendid Theater Square Completed
You have completed your civilization's first Theater Square with a starting adjacency bonus of 3 [ICON_Culture] Culture or higher.
Delightful songs, inspiring words. The artists, poets, and playwrights of {CityName} all stroll the streets of our Theater Square.
First Neighborhood Completed
You have completed your civilization's first Neighborhood district.
The citizens of {CityName} are the first to discover that the only thing better than living in {CityName} is living in a slightly cleaner place outside of it.
World's First Neighborhood
You have completed the world's first Neighborhood district.
The citizens of {CityName} are the first in the world to discover that the only thing better than living in {CityName} is living in a slightly cleaner place outside of it.
Emergency Completed Successfully
As a member, you have succeeded in an Emergency.
The {EmergencyType} with {TargetPlayerCivName} is over, and we emerge triumphant. But what will the future hold?
Emergency Successfully Defended
As the target, you have succeeded in fighting off an Emergency against you.
The armies of jealous civilizations fail to stop our people! The {EmergencyType} dissolves in recrimination and blame.
First Discovery of a Natural Wonder
Our civilization's explorers are the first in the world to behold this natural wonder.
Explorers of {ActingPlayerCivName} are the first from a major civilization to set eyes on {FeatureType}!
First Discovery of a New Continent
Our civilization's explorers are the first in the world to find this continent.
Explorers of {ActingPlayerCivName} are the first from a major civilization to set foot on the continent of {ContinentName}!
First Armada
Your civilization's first Armada is formed.
From the deck of the {UnitType}, one can see the ships of our first Armada stretching off into distance, each flying our civilization's flag.
World's First Armada
The world's very first Armada is formed, under your command.
The immense power of the world's first Armada is ready to take to the high seas at our command!
First Army
Your civilization's first Army is formed.
The forces of our first Army march by in a seemingly unending procession!
World's First Army
The world's very first Army is formed, under your command.
The world has never seen the likes of an Army such as that of our {UnitType}! Our power is unmatched.
First Corps
Your civilization's first Corps is formed.
Mightier than a single unit, our first Corps stands ready to protect the civilization.
World's First Corps
The world's very first Corps is formed, under your command.
Our staff officers report that the world's first Corps is ready for action!
First Fleet
Your civilization's first Fleet is formed.
All hands salute the flag as our first Fleet assembles!
World's First Fleet
The world's very first Fleet is formed, under your command.
The assembled captains all report their ships ready to weigh anchor, as the world's first Fleet is ready for action!
Dark Age Begins
The game enters a new era, and your civilization has the challenges of a Dark Age to overcome.
The game enters the {PlayerEraType}, and your civilization has the challenges of a Dark Age to overcome.
Golden Age Begins
The game enters a new era, and your civilization has earned a Golden Age.
The game enters the {PlayerEraType}, and your civilization has earned a Golden Age.
Heroic Age Begins
The game enters a new era, and your civilization has earned a Heroic Age after overcoming past challenges.
The game enters the {PlayerEraType}, and your civilization has earned a Heroic Age after overcoming past challenges.
Normal Age Begins
The game enters a new era, and you have avoided a Dark Age.
The game enters the {PlayerEraType}, and you have avoided a Dark Age.
Tribal Village Contacted
A Tribal Village was contacted, giving strength to our budding cities.
Villagers bring gifts as they join our civilization.
First Tier 1 Government
Your civilization adopts its first Tier 1 Government.
{ActingPlayerCivName} adopts government by {GovernmentType}, leading to a new political age for the citizens.
First Tier 1 Government in World
Your civilization is the first to adopt a Tier 1 Government in the world.
The people of {ActingPlayerCivName} adopt a government of {GovernmentType}, the great synthesis of their political philosophy.
First Tier 2 Government
Your civilization adopts its first Tier 2 Government.
Ancient traditions of governance evolve, and {ActingPlayerLeaderName} chooses {GovernmentType} as its new way to rule.
First Tier 2 Government in World
Your civilization is the first to adopt a Tier 2 Government in the world.
The old ways were good, but time has shown their weakness. The people of {ActingPlayerCivName} find new strength with their adoption of {GovernmentType}.
First Tier 3 Government
Your civilization adopts its first Tier 3 Government.
The honorable traditions of the past will still form part of the new government of {GovernmentType} that {ActingPlayerCivName} has chosen.
First Tier 3 Government in World
Your civilization is the first to adopt a Tier 3 Government in the world.
Centuries of political philosophy reach their ultimate expression, as {ActingPlayerCivName} chooses {GovernmentType} as its new government for the future.
All Governors Appointed
You have appointed all available [ICON_Governor] Governors, securing the prosperity of many cities.
{GovernorName}, the {GovernorShortTitle}, enters your service and completes your staff of capable advisors.
Governor Fully Promoted
You have fully promoted a [ICON_Governor] Governor for the first time, unlocking powerful abilities to help a city.
The art of governance finds its ultimate expression in the leadership of {GovernorName}, the {GovernorShortTitle}.
Great Person Recruited
A [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person has traveled to our lands to share unique talents.
After deliberation, {GreatPersonIndividualName} chooses to bring their talents to {ActingPlayerCivName}.
Old Great Person Recruited
A [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person has traveled to our lands. Though better suited to a past era, they will still contribute great things to our civilization.
After deliberation, {GreatPersonIndividualName} chooses to bring their talents to {ActingPlayerCivName}.
Great Person Lured by Faith
A [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person has traveled to our lands to share unique talents, thanks to our use of [ICON_Faith] Faith to make up more than half their recruitment cost.
The prayers of the faithful are answered! {GreatPersonIndividualName} appears to change the destiny of {ActingPlayerCivName}.
Great Person Lured by Gold
A [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person has traveled to our lands to share unique talents, thanks to our generous stipend of [ICON_Gold] Gold.
No expense was spared in bringing {GreatPersonIndividualName} to {ActingPlayerCivName}, where they begin their work.
Unique Tile Improvement Built
You have completed this unique tile improvement for the first time.
Truly, this {ImprovementType} represents our civilization's spirit and defines the landscape of our empire.
Inquisition Begins
Your Religion launches an inquisition.
The heavens rejoice as a righteous Inquisition begins to correct those who do not believe in {ReligionName}.
World's First Inquisition
Your Religion launches the world's first inquisition.
{ReligionName} is the first Religion to begin an Inquisition to root out heresies.
Pantheon Founded
Your people adopt Belief in a Pantheon.
Could this numinous moment be what those other prophets were talking about?
World's First Pantheon
Your people are the first in the world to adopt Belief in a Pantheon.
The first prophet has a flash of insight beneath a starry sky, and bows in thanksgiving to unseen gods.
City-State's First Suzerain
You have become the first Suzerain of this city-state.
The rulers of {CityStatePlayerCivName} bow to {ActingPlayerCivName}, who became their first Suzerain in the world.
Levied Army Stands Down
Your use of [ICON_Envoy] Envoys has convinced this city-state's levied army to stand down.
{TargetPlayerCivName} learns that politics is also a battlefield, as {ActingPlayerCivName} overturns their Suzerain status in {CityStatePlayerCivName}.
Enemy City-State Pacified
Your use of [ICON_Envoy] Envoys has toppled a hostile city-state's Suzerain, convincing it to end hostilities with you.
Previous mercenary contracts are subject to renegotiation, when {ActingPlayerCivName} overturns the old Suzerain of {CityStatePlayerCivName}.
City-State Army Levied
You have levied the military forces of a city-state.
The control of the armies of {CityStatePlayerCivName} passes to {ActingPlayerCivName} in an impressive military ceremony.
City-State Army Levied Near Enemy
You have levied the military forces of a city-state within striking distance of an enemy civilization.
A new front opens in the war between {TargetPlayerCivName} and {ActingPlayerCivName}, as control of {CityStatePlayerCivName} changes on the borders.
Met All Civilizations
You have met all living civilizations in the world.
Having finally met the people of {TargetPlayerCivName}, we have a funny feeling that there are no remaining civilizations out there.
World's First to Meet All Civilizations
You are the first to meet all living civilizations in the world.
We met the people of {TargetPlayerCivName}, and became the first to meet all the civilizations of the world.
Met New Civilization
You have made contact with a new civilization.
Wary welcomes and curious stares mark the moment of our meeting with the people of {TargetPlayerCivName}.
Overcame Dark Age
Your civilization has earned enough Era Score to overcome its Dark Age early, and rise into a Normal Age! The next Golden Age you earn will be extra powerful.
As fire purifies gold, so our Civilization has been purified by the trials of our Dark Age. Now all behold our renewed glory!
Manhattan Project Completed
Your scientists completed the Manhattan Project.
The terrible power of the atom is at our control now that we have completed the Manhattan Project.
Mars Component Launched
You have launched your civilization's first component for the Mars spacecraft.
Sure, anyone could build {LOC_GRAMMAR_A_AN << {ProjectShortName}}. But not anyone can put it in orbit.
World's First Mars Component Launched
You are the first in the world to launch a component for the Mars spacecraft.
An engineer watches a rocket thunder from the launch pad, carrying the {ProjectShortName}. "This is really happening," she says. "We're going to Mars."
Landed on the Moon
You send a successful mission to land on the moon.
Your scientists confirm what others have reported: The moon is very dusty.
World's First Landing on the Moon
You are the first in the world to land on the moon.
That's one small step for a man, and one giant leap for mankind, all thanks to our civilization.
Operation Ivy Completed
Your scientists completed Operation Ivy.
A nondescript folder contains the report of Operation Ivy's success. But what will contain the power of our new weapons?
Satellite Launched Into Orbit
You launched your civilization's first satellite into orbit.
At night our citizens point at a new star tracking across the sky - our first Satellite!
World's First Satellite in Orbit
You launched the world's first satellite into orbit.
Beep...beep...beep...beep...
Religion Founded
A Great Prophet founds a Religion, bringing light to your people.
{ReligionName} is the true path of salvation! Please ignore all those other ones!
World's First Religion
Your people are the first to form a Religion, bringing light to the world at large!
It is said that when {GreatPersonIndividualName} founded {ReligionName}, the world's first Religion, the sun broke through the clouds, and a sweet scent filled the air.
Ship Sunk
A naval unit was sunk in combat. Used by the Archaeology system to potentially generate [ICON_RESOURCE_SHIPWRECK] Shipwreck resources.
Master Spy Earned
One of your Spies has reached its maximum promotion level.
They say that {UnitCitizenName} has contacts in every city in the world, impeccable taste in clothing, and a car that transforms into a motorboat.
First Master Spy Earned
For the first time, one of your Spies has reached its maximum promotion level.
In a secret underground room, you thank {UnitCitizenName} for a successful career of service before the next mission begins.
First Technology of New Era
You have completed your civilization's first technology from a new era of discovery.
Many dispute the actual start of the {PlayerEraType}, but you know it was when {ActingPlayerCivName} discovered {TechnologyType}.
World's First Technology of New Era
You have completed the world's first technology from a new era of discovery.
The discovery of {TechnologyType} in {ActingPlayerCivName} sets the world stage for future discoveries in the {PlayerEraType}!
Trading Post Established in New Civilization
You have established your first [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Post in this civilization, opening up access to new markets.
Dusty and tired but eager to haggle, merchants open our first Trading Post in the lands of {TargetPlayerCivName}.
Trading Posts in All Civilizations
You have established a [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Post in all civilizations.
Our web of trade spans the world after the opening of the Trading Post in {CityName}.
First Trading Posts in All Civilizations
You are the first in the world to establish a [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Post in all civilizations.
Merchants and bankers cheer as we open our Trading Post in {CityName}. We are the first to trade in every civilization in the world!
Taking Flight
You completed your first flying unit. People rejoice at the new possibilities this entails.
The {UnitType} of {ActingPlayerCivName} went up, and did not immediately come down, to great rejoicing.
World's First Flight
You completed the world's first flying unit! People rejoice at the new possibilities this entails.
Humanity realized its dream of flight for the first time, as the {UnitType} of {ActingPlayerCivName} took to the skies.
On the Waves
You complete your first seafaring unit. A world of possibility awaits on the horizon.
The crew of the {UnitType} from {ActingPlayerCivName} invent the sailor's yarn after their first sea voyage.
World's First Seafaring
You completed the world's first seafaring unit! A world of possibility awaits on the horizon.
Yearning for new adventures, the {UnitType} from {ActingPlayerCivName} is the first in the world to roam the seas.
Strategic Resource Potential Unleashed
You own your first unit that uses this strategic resource.
Skeptics may ask: "What good {ResourceType : plural 1?is; other?are;} {ResourceType}?" But we know now that {ResourceType : plural 1?it is; other?they are;} a formidable weapon for our {UnitType}.
World's First Strategic Resource Potential Unleashed
You are the world's first civilization to own a unit using this strategic resource.

Before, {ResourceType} {ResourceType : plural 1?was; other?were;} merely a curiosity of scholars. Now our {UnitType} wields {ResourceType : plural 1?it; other?them;} as a weapon for the first time in the world.
Unique Unit Marches
You have trained this unique unit for the first time, giving you an edge on the battlefield.
Who but {ActingPlayerCivName} could create the {UnitType}? And who can possibly resist it?
Unit Promoted with Distinction
One of your units reaches its fourth level of promotion.
Citizens turn out in throngs to celebrate the latest triumph of our {UnitType}!
First Unit Promoted with Distinction
For the first time, one of your units reaches its fourth level of promotion.
Of all our military forces, this {UnitType} is the most famous. None yet has achieved so many victories in war.
Admiral Defeats Enemy
One of your [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admirals has overseen their first victorious offensive against an enemy unit.
{GreatPersonIndividualName} stands on deck, spyglass to eye, as the enemy ships sink to the ocean's depths.
General Defeats Enemy
One of your [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great Generals has overseen their first victorious offensive against an enemy unit.
{GreatPersonIndividualName} leads the troops in parade after a stunning victory.
Enemy Formation Defeated
One of your units defeated an enemy unit with a superior military formation.
Despite being heavily outnumbered, our {UnitType} has won the day!
Enemy Veteran Defeated
One of your units defeated an enemy unit with at least 2 more promotions than it.
Our {UnitType} has captured the battle standards of a veteran enemy!
Cause for War
You have utilized a Casus Belli to make war on another civilization.
The world agrees that our {WarType} against {TargetPlayerCivName} is well justified.
World Circumnavigated
Your civilization has revealed a tile in every vertical line of the map. This forms a path around the world, even if the path does not end where it began.
Following where few have gone before, {ActingPlayerCivName} circumnavigates the world.
World's First Circumnavigation
Your civilization is the first to reveal a tile in every vertical line of the map. This forms a path around the world, even if the path does not end where it began.
{ActingPlayerCivName} completes the world's first circumnavigation!

Sky and Stars

Sky and Stars Golden Age:[NEWLINE]Unlocks the [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas for Advanced Flight, Nuclear Fission, and Rocketry if in the Atomic Era. If in the Information Era the Eurekas for Satellites, Robotics, Nuclear Fusion, and Nanotechnology are unlocked. +100% XP earned for all Air Units.
Sky and Stars Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score for each Aerodrome building constructed. Gain +1 Era Score each time a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person is Earned.
Sky and Stars Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score for each Aerodrome building constructed. Gain +1 Era Score each time a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person is Earned.
Pen, Brush, and Voice
Pen, Brush, and Voice Golden Age:[NEWLINE][ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspirations provide an additional 10% of civic costs. Each city receives +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for each specialty district
Pen, Brush, and Voice Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you trigger an [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration. +1 Era Score for constructing a building with a Great Work Slot.
Pen, Brush, and Voice Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you trigger an [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration. +1 Era Score for constructing a building with a Great Work Slot.
Reform the Coinage
Reform the Coinage Golden Age:[NEWLINE]Your Traders cannot be plundered. International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes provide +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold per specialty district in the foreign city.
Reform the Coinage Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you successfully complete a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route.
Reform the Coinage Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you successfully complete a [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route.
Bodyguard of Lies
Bodyguard of Lies Golden Age:[NEWLINE]Takes no time to establish presence in an enemy city. Time to complete all offensive missions reduced by 25%.
Bodyguard of Lies Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score for each successful offensive Spy operation.
Bodyguard of Lies Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score for each successful offensive Spy operation.
Hic Sunt Dracones

Hic Sunt Dracones Golden Age:[NEWLINE]+3 starting [ICON_Citizen] Population for cities settled on a different continent than your first city. +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for naval and embarked units. +2 Loyalty per turn for cities not on your original [ICON_Capital] Capital's continent.
Hic Sunt Dracones Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +3 Era Score each time you discover a new Continent or natural wonder. Gain +1 Era Score each time you kill a non-Barbarian naval unit in combat.
Hic Sunt Dracones Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +3 Era Score each time you discover a new Continent or natural wonder. Gain +1 Era Score each time you kill a non-Barbarian naval unit in combat.
Heartbeat of Steam

Heartbeat of Steam Golden Age:[NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_Production] Production toward Industrial era and later wonders. Campus district's [ICON_SCIENCE] Science adjacency bonus provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production as well.
Heartbeat of Steam Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score for each Industrial or later building constructed.
Heartbeat of Steam Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score for each Industrial or later building constructed.
Monumentality

Monumentality Golden Age:[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all Builders. May purchase civilian units with [ICON_Faith] Faith. Builders and Settlers are 30% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_FAITH] Faith and [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Monumentality Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you construct a new specialty District.
Monumentality Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you construct a new specialty District.
To Arms!

To Arms! Golden Age:[NEWLINE]Unlock a special Casus Belli which gives 75% less warmonger penalties than formal war and can be used immediately after Denouncing the target. +15% [ICON_Production] Production towards military units.
To Arms! Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you kill a non-Barbarian Corps in combat and +2 Era Score each time you kill a non-Barbarian Army in combat.
To Arms! Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you kill a non-Barbarian Corps in combat and +2 Era Score each time you kill a non-Barbarian Army in combat.
Exodus of the Evangelists

Exodus of the Evangelists Golden Age:[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all Missionaries, Apostles, and Inquisitors. Additionally, newly trained ones get +2 Charges. +4 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points per turn.
Exodus of the Evangelists Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +2 Era Score each time you convert a city to your founded Religion for the first time.
Exodus of the Evangelists Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +2 Era Score each time you convert a city to your founded Religion for the first time.
Free Inquiry

Free Inquiry Golden Age:[NEWLINE][ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas provide an additional 10% of technology costs. Commercial Hub and Harbor district's [ICON_GOLD] Gold adjacency bonus provides [ICON_Science] Science as well.
Free Inquiry Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you trigger a [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka. +1 Era Score for constructing a building that provides Science as a base yield.
Free Inquiry Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each time you trigger a [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka. +1 Era Score for constructing a building that provides Science as a base yield.
Wish You Were Here
Wish You Were Here Golden Age:[NEWLINE]Cities with [ICON_Governor] Governors receive +50% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism from World Wonders. +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism to all National Parks.
Wish You Were Here Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each Artifact extracted.
Wish You Were Here Dedication Bonus:[NEWLINE]Gain +1 Era Score each Artifact extracted.
